DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to find out the effect of Skanlab at knee arthrosis.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Skanlab Regarding Knee Arthrosis
DOC.detailed_description: The patients diagnosed with knee arthrosis will be treated With Skanlab twice a week for four weeks.
DOC.criteria: knee arthrosis in one or both legs Pacemaker infusion pump cancer diabetes pregnancy blood clots bacteriological inflammation reduced sensitivity in the treatment area.
